Key Match Events: Musa Barrow pulled one back for Gambia on the stroke of half-time
Ebrima Colley managed to convert a 98th minute penalty for his side
Pre-Game Insights: Côte d’Ivoire are expected to make their way out of Group F
Jean Louis Gasset mentioned that the African giants oversaw a dream start to their World Cup qualifying campaign
Post-Match Reflections: Gasset is focused on having multiple blueprints when setting up his team
Gambia suffered an unlikely 3-2 loss against Burundi at the Benjamin Mkapa National Stadium
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Ivory Coast were the biggest winners in the latest round of World Cup qualifiers, following their mammoth 9-0 win over Seychelles
Côte d’Ivoire are at the top of the pile given their nine-goal advantage
Others: The match will take place at the Benjamin Mkapa National Stadium
